statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: There are many different points int xoy coordinate axes. Connect every two points with straight line. How many triangles can you find.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There are many test cases. Please process to end of file. First of each test case is an integer N (3 <= N <= 1000). Then N line follows, each line contains one unique point X, Y (-10000000 <= X, Y <= 10000000).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Print the number of triangles you can find.
